"I'm Cahara of the South, a mercenary at your service."
"I do have a mission here, but let's save that story for
"I was caught by one of those malformed prison guards..."
Your conversation took an awkward turn for some reason...
"Uhh... I'm feeling kind of weak after being left here
"Would you mind if we travelled together for a while?"
"Eeh, except there doesn't seem to be room in your party."
"Well, I guess I can manage on my own too, no worries."
"Don't let the dungeon have it's way with you. Bye."
"Eeh, fine. I guess I'll manage on my own then."
"Don't let the dungeon have it's way with you. Bye."
